title: Drawing, "Design for a Bracelet", 1800–25
medium:
Pen and brown ink, gray wash, yellow, plum watercolor
Support: white laid paper
markings: Marks: Part of a watermark: part of monogram and the "Vogheyt". Similar to Churchill 95.
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli, Rome; Mr. and Mrs. Edward Brandegee, Boston
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund

exhibitions.title: Body Language: Jewelry and Accessories from the National Design Museum
